TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit LockingPersistenceProvider extends System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider
Public MustInherit Class LockingPersistenceProvider Inherits PersistenceProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 从中派生所有实现锁定的持久性服务永久性提供程序的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class from which all durable service persistence providers that implement locking are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了持久性以外， 类还实现服务状态数据记录的锁定。In addition to persistence, the class implements locking of service state data records. 与之交互的方法保存数据 (如`Load`方法) 具有一个可选参数 (`lockInstance`)，它定义是否发布或维护相关数据的锁。Methods that interact with persisted data (such as the `Load` method) have an optional parameter (`lockInstance`) that defines whether locks on the data in question are released or maintained.

param.name: id
param.span: 要与此永久性提供程序实例关联的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier to be associated with this persistence provider instance.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，创建 类的新实例，使用指定标识值进行配置。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the class, configured with the specified identity value.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，以在持久性存储区中创建实例状态信息。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to create instance state information in the persistence store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调入 方法，后者采用附加参数来确定实例是否已被解除锁定。This method calls into the method, which takes an additional parameter to determine whether the instance is unlocked. 此方法将传递`false`作为此参数为调用的方法的值。This method passes `false` as a value for this parameter to the calling method.

summary.span: 将状态数据从持久性存储区加载到永久性提供程序中，并且持久性存储区中的状态数据已更改时，将进入“LoadIfChanged”阶段。

span.span: The LoadIfChanged phase occurs when state data is loaded into the persistence provider from the persistence store and the state data in the persistence store has been changed.

param.span: 先前的 Create 或 Update 方法调用所返回的标记，表示调用方具有的当前状态。

span.span: The token returned by the previous Create or Update method calls, which represents the current state held by the caller.

param.name: instance
param.span: 实例状态信息。

span.span: The instance state information.

summary.span: 在实例状态信息自上次被调用方加载后已发生更改的情况下从持久性存储区中加载此状态信息。

span.span: Loads the instance state information from the persistence store if the state information has been changed since the last time the information was loaded by the caller.

summary.span: 此方法还可让调用方指定是否在持久性存储区中锁定实例。

span.span: This method also lets the caller specify whether to lock the instance in the persistence store.

returns.span: 如果应在此操作结束时在持久性存储区中锁定实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance should be locked in the persistence store at the end of this operation; otherwise .

Public MustOverride Sub Unlock (timeout As TimeSpan)
public: abstract void Unlock(TimeSpan timeout);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间段，永久性提供程序在该时间段后将中止此操作。

span.span: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts the operation.

summary.span: 对其 ID 在持久性存储区中构造 对象时已指定的实例进行解锁。

span.span: Unlocks the instance whose ID is specified when constructing the object in the persistence store.

summary.span: 在持久性存储区中更新实例状态信息。

span.span: Updates the instance state information in the persistence store.

param.name: instance
param.span: 实例状态信息。

span.span: The instance state information.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 时间段，永久性提供程序在该时间段后将中止此操作。

span.span: The time period after which the persistence provider aborts the operation.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，更新持久性存储区中的实例状态信息。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, updates the instance state information in the persistence store.

summary.span: 此方法不会在更新持久性存储区中的实例状态信息后对实例进行解锁。

span.span: This method does not unlock the instance after updating the instance state information in the persistence store.
